definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: si vera l. deliver up, offer (NH [[מָסַר]]; Aram. msar deliver up, denounce, betray, [[מְסַר]]; Hom:ZMG xivi. 1892, 530 comp. Sab. [[מסר]] take away);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. ´[[לִמְסָר־מַ֫עַל בי]] Nu 31:16 offer (commit) a trespass against ´[[י]], but rd.. [[לִמְעׂל]], cf. Thes Di (v. Nu 5:6, 2Ch 36:14).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּמָּֽסְרוּ]] Nu 31:5 delivered over to, assigned to (of warriors), rd. perh. [[וַיִּסָּֽפְרוּ]] (LXX. e)chri/qmhsan) cf. Thes.
